In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are:

1. pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione unit
2. DPP (which stands for diketopyrrolopyrrole)
3. BDT units (which stands for benzodithiophene units)

These entities are materials or building blocks used in optoelectronic applications, as mentioned in the paragraph.
